shows.title: Bilal Zafarâ€™s Midnight Special
shows.desc:
Bilal Zafar returns with an hour of his best and some brand new material just for “amazing Greenbelt”! Join him – just after midnight – for a fun hour of brilliant storytelling comedy that is both gentle and withering.

Bilal Zafar is an Edinburgh Fringe Best Newcomer Award nominee and winner of Hackney Empire New Act of the Year.

Supported by Amal – A Saïd Foundation Programme
